G

GA - Class in data
The Genetic algorithm for solving the Travelling salesman problem.
GA() - Constructor for class data.GA
 
generateAmount - Static variable in class gui.panel.ButtonPanel
 
getAll() - Static method in class data.SolutionManager
Gets all the cities in the current solution.
getAllInPath() - Method in class data.Path
Gets all cities in a path.
getAllpaths() - Method in class data.Population
Gets all the paths in the population.
getAverage() - Method in class data.Population
Calculates the average fitness and distance in the population and creates a path to hold this information for statistical uses.
getCity(int) - Method in class data.Path
Gets a given city in a path by location.
getCity(int) - Static method in class data.SolutionManager
Gets a city in the path solution by index.
getDistance() - Method in class data.Path
Gets the current path total distance.
getDistanceBetween(City) - Method in class data.City
Calculates the distance between cities using Pythagoras' theorem.
getFitness() - Method in class data.Path
Get the fitness of the path.
getFittest() - Method in class data.Population
Gets the fittest (best) path in the population.
getID() - Method in class data.City
Returns the ID of the coordinate.
getInitialDistance() - Method in class data.Path
Gets the initial distance of the path when cities are initially added.
getName() - Method in enum data.SelectionType
Gets the text value name of the selection type.
getPath(int) - Method in class data.Population
Gets a path from the population given a location.
getSize() - Static method in class data.SolutionManager
Gets the size of the path.
getX() - Method in class data.City
Returns the x coordinate.
getY() - Method in class data.City
Returns the y coordinate.
